text: Real-time RT-PCR analysis of <extra_id_0> Foxp3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and HTLV-I <extra_id_0> Tax <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression was performed as previously described [ 8 , 47 ] .

text: Briefly , total RNA was extracted using the RNeasy Mini Kit ( Qiagen , Valencia , California , United States ) according to manufacturer 's guidelines , and cDNA was synthesized by reverse transcription using TaqMan Gold RT-PCR Kit using random hexamer primers ( Applied Biosystems , Foster City , California , United States ) .

<extra_id_0> Foxp3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and HTLV-I <extra_id_0> Tax <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA expression was quantified by real-time PCR using ABI PRISM 7700 Sequence Detection System ( Applied Biosystems ) .
